title: The Secrets of Nygard Cay
description: An investigation into allegations against fashion mogul Peter Nygard, accused of sex trafficking dozens of women over several decades, reveals new details in the case. Natalie Morales reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
